short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Covers up web content (including video) with a black box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't want to see something on a web page? Just right-click and click "Add Black Box" to add a resizable black box that can cover any part of the page you wish. Great for hiding ugly people in online videos!
